heading: rants & raves
subheading: date: thu, 2 dec 1999 11:53:57 -0700 from: “shelly / celena” (tramposh@earthlink.net) to: newsfeedback@wired.com subject: great wto coverage thank you for printing what needed to be said (“what’s behind the wto ruckus?,” 2.dec.99)! all my local tv stations chose to ignore and refuse to report on the issues around the wto and its ability to […]
author: wired blogs
text: date: thu, 2 dec 1999 11:53:57 -0700 from: "shelly / celena" (tramposh@earthlink.net)to: newsfeedback@wired.comsubject: great wto coveragethank you for printing what needed to be said ("what's behind the wto ruckus?," 2.dec.99)! all my local tv stations chose to ignore and refuse to report on the issues around the wto and its ability to control where jobs are and how the earth will look a few years from now. your article, however, has distilled the issues quickly and fairly. thank you.
